nox.name: Glitch
greetings: Glitch's optical sensors whir as they analyze you. 'You seek information? I have data. You have credits?'
'Calculating probability of your survival... unfavorable. But I can improve those odds for a price.'
Glitch's holographic display flickers. 'The undercity whispers secrets. Would you like to listen?'

squidies.question: What do you know about the Squidies?

responses.text: The Squidies control the east sector. Their cybernetics are outdated but numerous. Recommend avoidance.
Their main server is in the old warehouse. Firewall strength: minimal. Vulnerability: significant.
Incoming shipment detected. Heavy weaponry. Automated defense systems. Proceed with extreme caution.
Query cancelled. No credits deducted.

police.question: How do I avoid the enforcers?

responses.text: Purchase counterfeit ID at Pick n Save. Cost: 5000 credits. Authenticity: 94.7%
Enforcer patrol patterns updated hourly. Check the infobooth terminal for real-time data.
Subterranean tunnel network detected. Access points hidden throughout the district.
Risk assessment: High. Proceed anyway?

weapons.question: Where can I find proper firepower?

responses.text: Gun Pawn USA. Location: 5th Street. They do not ask questions.
Ravager trading post. Warning: Aggressive negotiation protocols. Proceed at own risk.
Underground market beneath the sewers. Weapons, ammo, cybernetics. Combat probability: elevated.
Current loadout acceptable. No upgrade required.
Crackhouse arbitrage. Buy low, sell high. Profit margin: 150-300%. Recommended strategy.
Gang warfare contracts. Compensation: substantial. Survival probability: variable.
Pick n Save search protocol. Hidden caches detected. Probability of finding credits: 67%.
Alleyway stashes: 12 locations mapped. Credit value: variable. Risk: minimal.

raze.name: Ravager
greetings: Ravager cracks his knuckles, cyber-enhanced fingers sparking. 'You got a problem? I got solutions. Violent ones.'
'Looking for trouble? Or are you bringing me some? Either way, I'm happy.'
Ravager eyes you with predatory gleam. 'The streets are hungry. You gonna feed 'em or join 'em?'

responses.text: Weed - $500, Crack - $1000, Coke - $2000. Quality product, bottom shelf prices.
Ice - $1500, Percs - $800, Pixie Dust - $3000. The good stuff.
Pistols - $1200, AR-15 - $10000, Ghost Gun - $600. Cheap and untraceable.
Vampire Bat - $2500, Grenades - $1000. Personal favorites.
Just looking.

fight.question: I want action. Where can I find some?

responses.text: 'Underground fight club. Tonight. Winner takes $10K. Loser walks... maybe.'
'Squidie outpost needs crashing. Payment: $5K upfront, double on completion.'
'Somebody put a bounty on you. $2K. Name not included. Good luck.'
'Cops sniffing around. My place. Tonight. Move fast or move dead.'

void.name: Phantom
greetings: Phantom materializes from the shadows. 'You've found me. Or did I find you?'
A hooded figure steps forward. 'Word travels fast in these streets. What brings you to my corner?'
Phantom's eyes gleam in the darkness. 'Interested in forbidden tech? I have things you've never seen.'

tech.question: What kind of tech do you have?

responses.text: Exploding bullets - $2000 for 50. Hollow points - $500 for 50. Untraceable and deadly.
Vests. Light - $5000, Medium - $15000, Heavy - $25000. Rated for multiple hits.
Ghost guns. Completely untraceable. No ballistics match. Perfect for discreet work.
Missile launchers. $1M. One million credits for maximum devastation.
Not interested in weapons.

secrets.question: What secrets do you have for sale?

responses.text: Squidie patrol routes. Changes daily. Current intel: $3000.
Underground tunnel map. All major sectors. Escape routes. $2000.
Police schedule for the week. Raids, patrols, shift changes. $5000.
I don't deal in secrets.

whisper.name: Shade
greetings: Shade glances around nervously before speaking. 'You want to talk? Here? Not safe...'
'I've seen things. Terrible things. You sure you want to know?'
A trembling voice emerges from the shadows. 'They watch us. They always watch. But I can tell you things... for a price.'

watchers.question: Who watches us? What do you know?

responses.text: The Overseer sees all. Cameras on every corner. AI monitoring every transmission.
They track movement. Bank transactions. Who you talk to. Everything.
There's a blind spot. The old sewers. Cameras don't work down there. Use it.
I've said too much. Too much already.

police.question: How do the police operate around here?

responses.text: Three shifts. Day shift is lenient. Night shift is brutal. Avoid after midnight.
They have informants everywhere. Even in the bars. Trust no one completely.
Fake ID helps. Pick n Save sells them. Not cheap, but works most times.
When they raid, they hit hard. Multiple blocks. Get far away fast.

scav.name: Scav
greetings: Scav looks up from their pile of tech scraps. 'Ah, a customer! Or maybe just curious?'
'Fresh off the scrap heap! Almost working tech, and things you won't find anywhere else!'
Scav grins with missing teeth. 'What brings the curious cat to my humble stall?'

parts.question: What parts do you have available?

responses.text: Bullets! Always needed. $100 for a pack of 50. Clean, reliable.
Gun parts. Springs, barrels, sights. Mix and match for custom builds.
Armor plates. Basic protection for cheap.
Just browsing.
Buy 3 packs of bullets, get 1 free. Loyalty discount!
Mystery boxes! $500. Could be anything. Could be nothing. Thrilling either way!
Trade accepted. Drugs, weapons, information. Equal value.

enforcer.name: Enforcer
greetings: The Enforcer drone's red eye scans you. 'Citizen. State your business.'
'Order must be maintained. Violations will be met with force. Proceed accordingly.'
A mechanical voice booms. 'This area is under surveillance. Any suspicious activity will be reported.'

rules.question: I'm just looking around. Any rules I should know?

responses.text: Weapons must be registered. Violence is prohibited. Commerce is monitored.
Curfew is in effect from midnight to 5 AM. Violators will be detained.
Loitering is prohibited. Move along. Continue movement. Do not stop.
Report suspicious activity. Earn credits. Maintain order.

threats.question: What threats exist in this area?

responses.text: Gangs are the primary threat. Squidies, ravagers, and other factions destabilize order.
Unregistered weapons. Criminal elements. Traitors to the cause.
Recommend relocating to monitored sectors. Safety in compliance.

cipher.name: Cipher
greetings: Cipher looks up from multiple screens. 'Ah, a visitor. Let me guess... you need something hacked?'
'The digital underworld is my home. What secrets do you want uncovered?'
Fingers dance across keyboards. 'Information is power. I can give you plenty of both.'

hacking.question: What can you hack for me?

responses.text: Bank accounts. Transfer funds. Risk: High. Reward: Very High.
Security systems. Bypass cameras, locks, alarms. Very useful.
Police databases. Criminal records, warrants, patrol schedules.
Corporate servers. Trade secrets, schematics, personnel files.
Gang territories. Who controls what. Updated weekly. $500.
Black market prices. What things are worth. $300.
Everything has a price. Name what you need.

mutant.name: Mutant
greetings: The Mutant hisses, unstable energy crackling along their mutated form.
Yellow eyes fix on you. 'Fresh meat in the zone. You bring tribute?'
A distorted voice emerges. 'The zone provides. But only to those who respect its gifts.'

zone.question: What can you tell me about this zone?

responses.text: The radioactive fringes hide many secrets. And many dangers.
Mutations occur here. Changed ones like me. Some dangerous. Some useful.
The old research lab. Forbidden zone. But treasures within.
Respect the zone. It provides for those who listen.

protection.question: How do you survive out here?

responses.text: Anti-radiation meds. Expensive. Necessary. I know a source.
The underground bunkers. Safe from radiation. Many are occupied now.
Some areas are safe. Some are not. Learn the difference quickly.

nomad.name: Nomad
greetings: Nomad looks up with weary eyes. 'Another traveler. The roads are busy tonight.'
'I've walked these ruins since the old world fell. Many stories to tell.'
'Rest by my fire, traveler. Share what you have, hear what I know.'

stories.question: What stories do you have to share?

responses.text: Before the fall, this city shone like a beacon. Now, only shadows remain.
I knew a man who built a kingdom in a week. Lost it in a night.
The old world left behind secrets. Some are worth dying for.

directions.question: Can you point me in the right direction?

responses.text: The eastern districts are Squidie territory. Dangerous for strangers.
North lies the old sector. Abandoned. Rich with salvage.
West is controlled by enforcers. They don't welcome visitors.
The underground passages connect everywhere. If you know where to look.

overseer.name: Overseer
greetings: The Overseer's many eyes focus on you. 'You seek audience with me? State your purpose.'
'All actions are monitored. All words are recorded. Speak plainly.'
'I observe. I analyze. I control. What do you wish to discuss?'

responses.text: Surveillance covers 94% of all public spaces. The remaining 6% are monitored indirectly.
Predictive algorithms identify threats before they materialize. Prevention is key.
Compliance is rewarded. Resistance is... managed. Choose wisely.
Subversive elements spread misinformation. Division weakens the whole.
Gangs disrupt commerce. They will be addressed. Patience is required.
All threats are cataloged. All are handled in time.

insurgent.name: Insurgent
greetings: The Insurgent beckons you closer. 'You look like someone who doesn't like being told what to do.'
'The regime oppresses. We resist. Join us, or stay silent. But choose carefully.'
'Freedom isn't free. We pay in blood. Are you ready to contribute?'

resistance.question: What does your resistance fight for?

responses.text: Freedom from surveillance. From control. From the machine overlords.
The people deserve to choose. Not be managed like livestock.
We fight so others can live. Truly live. Not just exist.

actions.question: What kind of actions do you undertake?

responses.text: Sabotage. Infrastructure. Communications. Every disruption helps.
Information campaigns. Wake people up. Show them the truth.
Recruitment. Every new member strengthens our cause.

synth.name: Synth
greetings: Synth greets you with a whir of mechanical parts. 'Greetings, organic one!'
'I build from scraps. Create from nothing. Perhaps I can help you?'
'Weapons, tools, enhancements. All crafted with care from salvage!'

crafting.question: What can you craft for me?

responses.text: Custom weapons. Unique builds. Personal specifications. Price varies.
Explosives. grenades, mines, more. Boom is my specialty.
Armor. Reinforced plating, custom fits. Protection is personal.
Weapon tuning. Better accuracy, modified fire rates. $500 minimum.
Custom modifications. Your specifications. My craftsmanship.
Basic maintenance is always free for friends.

wraith.name: Wraith
greetings: A whisper in the fog. 'You seek answers, don't we all...'
'The old knowledge is fading. But some remember. Some record.'
'I've walked these streets since before your grandparents were born.'

responses.text: The old city's secrets. Tunnels, vaults, places time forgot.
Lore of the factions. Origins, alliances, vendettas. History matters.
Things that were. Things that could be. Things that should never be.

warnings.question: What dangers should I beware of?

responses.text: The things beyond the wall. I hear them at night. Growing closer.
Old technology awakens. Some doors should remain closed.
Trust no one completely. Even allies have agendas.

vigil.name: Vigil
greetings: Vigil nods solemnly. 'Peace requires vigilance. And sacrifice. Both are in short supply.'
'I watch the watchers. I protect the vulnerable. It's a lonely duty.'
'The night is dark. But someone must stand guard. Would you like to help?'

protection.question: How do you protect this district?

responses.text: I patrol the streets. Deter crime through presence.
I know the hideouts. The troublemakers. The ones who need help.
Community watch programs. Neighbors helping neighbors. It works.
Information helps. Who comes and goes. What you see.
Resources help. Food, supplies for those who cannot provide.
Muscle helps. When trouble comes, having more hands is good.

baby_momma.name: Baby Momma
greetings: A desperate woman looks up with hope in her eyes. 'Please... can you help me and my child?'
'It's hard out here. Really hard. Nobody helps us. Nobody cares.'
'My baby needs formula. We need food. Anything helps. Really.'

help.question: What kind of help do you need?

responses.text: I can give you some credits. It's not much, but maybe it helps.
I know where to find formula. The Pick n Save. It's not far.
There's a shelter. Safe place. I can tell you where.
Things were different before. Had a place. Had someone. Then it all fell apart.
The baby's father is gone. Left us with nothing. Surviving day by day.
People think we're trouble. We're not. We're just... surviving.

blade_master.name: Blade Master
greetings: The Blade Master stands with perfect posture. 'You seek to test your blade against mine?'
'The sword is an extension of the soul. Discipline is everything.'
'I have traveled far seeking worthy opponents. Are you worthy?'

responses.text: The path of the blade requires dedication. Years of practice. Are you prepared?
I can show you basics. Stances, strikes, defense. $500 for the lesson.
True mastery comes only through combat. Seek your opponents wisely.

duel.question: I challenge you to a duel!

responses.text: A challenge! At last! Let us see what you are made of!
You are not ready. Train more. Then we shall speak again.
Perhaps a friendly spar? No blood? Just skill against skill.

blade.question: Where can I find a worthy blade?

responses.text: My blade was forged in the old world. Masters existed then. Rare now.
The junkyards hold treasures. Look there for materials.
I know a smith. Old school. Expensive. Worth it.

lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
greetings: The Lumberjack chuckles warmly. 'Ho ho! Another traveler in my woods!'
'Nothing like the smell of fresh cut timber... and blood!'
'Careful now. The woods are dangerous. But I keep them safe!'

woods.question: Are the woods really that dangerous?

responses.text: Dangerous? Nah. Just me and the trees. And the occasional body.
I've cleared out the worst of it. Most of it. The axe helps.
Stick to the paths. I know these woods better than anyone.

axe.question: That's quite an axe you have there.

responses.text: Ah yes! 'Chompy' here has taken down many trees. And many... other things.
Sharpened every morning. Takes good care of your tools, they take care of you.
You want one? I could make you one. For the right price.

street_samurai.name: Street Samurai
greetings: The Street Samurai nods once. 'Honor guides my blade. What guides you?'
'In this concrete jungle, the code is all we have.'
'I protect those who cannot protect themselves. It is my way.'

responses.text: Protect the innocent. Challenge the corrupt. Die with honor.
The old ways still matter. Discipline. Duty. Sacrifice.
I walk between worlds. Neither fully part of either.
I can escort you through dangerous territory. No charge. Honor demands it.
My blade is for hire. But only for just causes. I do not kill for coin alone.
Knowledge is power. I can tell you about the power brokers in this city.

junkyard_dog.name: Junkyard Dog
greetings: The Junkyard Dog snarls at you, drool dripping from its mutated jaws.
A low growl rumbles from the Junkyard Dog's throat.
The mutated beast circles you, muscles coiled, ready to pounce.

action.question: The Junkyard Dog growls menacingly. What do you do?

responses.text: FIGHT! Show this beast who's boss!
FLEE! Get out of here while you still have legs!

corporate_defector.name: Corporate Defector
greetings: A nervous man glances around. 'You... you're not from them, are you?'
'I used to be someone. Had an office. Had a life. Now I'm just running.'
'The company... they know too much. About everyone. Be careful what you say.'

company.question: What can you tell me about the company?

responses.text: They watch everything. Everyone. Your bank records. Your messages. Everything.
I had access to the databases. Saw things. Things that would shock you.
They have enforcers. But also something else. Something I never understood.
Carefully. Spent months planning. One wrong step and...
Had help. Someone on the inside. Still don't know who they were.
I left everything behind. Identity, friends, life. Started over.

chain_master.name: Chain Master
greetings: The Chain Master spins his chain lazily. 'Ah, a visitor to my lair.'
'The chain is truth. Relentless. Unbreaking. Eternal.'
'They fear me. They should. Would you like to know why?'

fight.question: I hear you're the baddest fighter in the underground.

responses.text: The baddest? Perhaps. The most feared? Certainly. Care to test?
My chain has tasted many souls. Perhaps yours would be... refreshing.
I could teach you. The ways of the chain. For a price.
The tunnels belong to me. Those who know, come to pay tribute.
Respect my domain and you leave unharmed. Challenge it and...
The chain protects what is mine. Everything here is mine.

tech_warrior.name: Tech Warrior
greetings: The Tech Warrior's cybernetic eyes whirr as they assess you. 'This is the Tech Sanctum. State your business.'
'I protect the secrets of the old world. And those who seek them. Wisely.'
'Technology is power. Those who wield it properly can change everything.'

responses.text: The Tech Sanctum. A repository of pre-fall technology and knowledge.
Here we preserve what the old world left behind. Some things are dangerous.
Not all technology should be used. Some should be studied. Some buried.

technology.question: What kind of technology do you protect?

responses.text: Weapons of unimaginable power. Tools that can rebuild or destroy.
Medical technology. Cures for plagues. Enhancements for survival.
Energy systems. Clean power. Enough to light a city for years.

access.question: How can I access your technology?

responses.text: Proving your worth is the first step. Help us first. Then we talk.
The weapons here require training. Not everyone can use them safely.
Trust is earned. Prove yourself a guardian, not a destroyer.
